channel.title: Shops/PK
channel.description: how would i add a shop, and also how do i add pk areas? any help appreciated. Also, how do i edit amount of xp from pressing on hay/door/dummy.also how do i make the ::tele X Y command admin only

item.title: Shops/PK
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

to edit the dummy xp and etc. search for what it says when you hit it and edit the addskill xp
adding a shop you add it to shops.cfg and add the wanneshop into your client.java but make sure the ids match
